definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: And, to quote an old advertising adage , sex sells.
sentences.chinese: 套用一句廣告俗語，那就是“出賣色相”。

sentences.english: Ren-sheng related death robbed send lightly, evil-color value.
sentences.chinese: 任生關死劫輕輕送，千般色相偏看重。

sentences.english: She performed sexual favors for her boss to get promoted. ;
sentences.chinese: 她對老闆犧牲色相以獲得拔擢。

sentences.english: The utilization of colour-blending theory can work out all kinds of cocoon silk of colour spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 利用色彩調和理論可以生產出更多色相的彩色繭絲。

sentences.english: Would you believe that chimpanzees have sex for "money"?
sentences.chinese: 大猩猩也會爲了錢會犧牲色相，難以置信？

definition: shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
